title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about an Eli Lilly deal, an Amgen acquisition, and much more
description: Eli Lilly is in advanced talks to acquire Ventyx Biosciences, which is developing pills for autoimmune conditions, for more than $1 billion
content: Eli Lilly is in advanced talks to acquire Ventyx Biosciences, which is developing pills for autoimmune conditions, for more than $1 billion
